name: wporg-release
description: Release WP plugins and themes to wporg

scripts.release: npm run i18n && node ./src/run/release.js -- build github wporg
scripts.package:wporg: cp ./.wporg/screenshot-*.png . && git add . && git commit -m "tmp" && git archive --format=zip --prefix=acf-dropzone/ --output=../acf-dropzone.zip --worktree-attributes HEAD && git reset --hard HEAD~
scripts.rollback: git reset --hard HEAD~ && git push origin +master
